attributes.background:

There need`s to be something to get order in place for young people, it`s out of hand, when there parents argue and manslaughter an innocent victim in London, what is going on? http://uk.news.yahoo.com/4/20090226/tuk-woman-guilty-of-queue-jump-attack-dba1618.html
something needs to be done, children look up to their parents,(what happened), Thatcher stood up to the EU and about everything else... . take a stance and get the UK in order as it`s needed to be as presently this little island is falling asleep without any expectations or dreams... ..
